column4: question:  I want to run ubuntu as my main os on a macbook pro.  Can I then make a mac os x vm?
I saw here that it is possible https://help.ubuntu.com/community/MacBookPro
but I know making osx vm is a little tricky, but in this case I will be running on macbook hardware so it should be ok?  EULA?
i think you are allowed to virtualise osx as long as you are on osx hardware (check the license to be sure though)
